On a bright Monday morning, Robo, a shiny new robot, rolled into Sunshine Elementary. Excited yet nervous, he scanned the colorful classroom filled with chattering children. His circuits buzzed with anticipation. The teacher, Ms. Harper, introduced him, and the students gasped in awe. During math class, Robo demonstrated multiplication by arranging colorful blocks, making learning fun. However, at recess, he struggled to play tag, his metallic limbs clanking awkwardly. But then, a brave girl named Mia invited him to join. Together, they created a new game called "Robot Tag," where everyone was a robot. By the end of the day, Robo felt like he belonged.
